short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your FB experience by filtering out ads or posts from your newsfeed, groups, pages or profile based on keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter your FB posts. You can show only ads, or no ads, specify keywords, or set posts with certain keywords to never show, Take full control again!
